00034 /**
00035  * \file
00036  *         A null RDC implementation that uses framer for headers.
00037  * \author
00038  *         Adam Dunkels <adam@sics.se>
00039  *         Niclas Finne <nfi@sics.se>
00040  */
00041 
00042 #include "net/mac/nullrdc.h"
00043 #include "net/packetbuf.h"
00044 #include "net/netstack.h"
00045 #include <string.h>
00046 
00047 #define DEBUG 0
00048 #if DEBUG
00049 #include <stdio.h>
00050 #define PRINTF(...) printf(__VA_ARGS__)
00051 #else
00052 #define PRINTF(...)
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #ifdef NULLRDC_CONF_ADDRESS_FILTER
00056 #define NULLRDC_ADDRESS_FILTER NULLRDC_CONF_ADDRESS_FILTER
00057 #else
00058 #define NULLRDC_ADDRESS_FILTER 1
00059 #endif /* NULLRDC_CONF_ADDRESS_FILTER */
00060 
00061 #ifndef NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK
00062 #ifdef NULLRDC_CONF_802154_AUTOACK
00063 #define NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK NULLRDC_CONF_802154_AUTOACK
00064 #else
00065 #define NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK 0
00066 #endif /* NULLRDC_CONF_802154_AUTOACK */
00067 #endif /* NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK */
00068 
00069 #ifndef NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW
00070 #ifdef NULLRDC_CONF_802154_AUTOACK_HW
00071 #define NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW NULLRDC_CONF_802154_AUTOACK_HW
00072 #else
00073 #define NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW 0
00074 #endif /* NULLRDC_CONF_802154_AUTOACK_HW */
00075 #endif /* NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW */
00076 
00077 #if NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK
00078 #include "sys/rtimer.h"
00079 #include "dev/watchdog.h"
00080 
00081 #define ACK_WAIT_TIME                      RTIMER_SECOND / 2500
00082 #define AFTER_ACK_DETECTED_WAIT_TIME       RTIMER_SECOND / 1500
00083 #define ACK_LEN 3
00084 #endif /* NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK */
00085 
00086 #if NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK || NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW
00087 struct seqno {
00088   rimeaddr_t sender;
00089   uint8_t seqno;
00090 };
00091 
00092 #ifdef NETSTACK_CONF_MAC_SEQNO_HISTORY
00093 #define MAX_SEQNOS NETSTACK_CONF_MAC_SEQNO_HISTORY
00094 #else /* NETSTACK_CONF_MAC_SEQNO_HISTORY */
00095 #define MAX_SEQNOS 16
00096 #endif /* NETSTACK_CONF_MAC_SEQNO_HISTORY */
00097 
00098 static struct seqno received_seqnos[MAX_SEQNOS];
00099 #endif /* NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK || NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW */
00100 
00101 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 static void
00103 send_packet(mac_callback_t sent, void *ptr)
00104 {
00105   int ret;
00106   packetbuf_set_addr(PACKETBUF_ADDR_SENDER, &rimeaddr_node_addr);
00107 #if NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK || NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW
00108   packetbuf_set_attr(PACKETBUF_ATTR_MAC_ACK, 1);
00109 #endif /* NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK || NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW */
00110 
00111   if(NETSTACK_FRAMER.create() == 0) {
00112     /* Failed to allocate space for headers */
00113     PRINTF("nullrdc: send failed, too large header\n");
00114     ret = MAC_TX_ERR_FATAL;
00115   } else {
00116 
00117 #if NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK
00118     int is_broadcast;
00119     uint8_t dsn;
00120     dsn = ((uint8_t *)packetbuf_hdrptr())[2] & 0xff;
00121 
00122     NETSTACK_RADIO.prepare(packetbuf_hdrptr(), packetbuf_totlen());
00123 
00124     is_broadcast = rimeaddr_cmp(packetbuf_addr(PACKETBUF_ADDR_RECEIVER),
00125                                 &rimeaddr_null);
00126 
00127     if(NETSTACK_RADIO.receiving_packet() ||
00128        (!is_broadcast && NETSTACK_RADIO.pending_packet())) {
00129 
00130       /* Currently receiving a packet over air or the radio has
00131          already received a packet that needs to be read before
00132          sending with auto ack. */
00133       ret = MAC_TX_COLLISION;
00134 
00135     } else {
00136       switch(NETSTACK_RADIO.transmit(packetbuf_totlen())) {
00137       case RADIO_TX_OK:
00138         if(is_broadcast) {
00139           ret = MAC_TX_OK;
00140         } else {
00141           rtimer_clock_t wt;
00142 
00143           /* Check for ack */
00144           wt = RTIMER_NOW();
00145           watchdog_periodic();
00146           while(RTIMER_CLOCK_LT(RTIMER_NOW(), wt + ACK_WAIT_TIME));
00147 
00148           ret = MAC_TX_NOACK;
00149           if(NETSTACK_RADIO.receiving_packet() ||
00150              NETSTACK_RADIO.pending_packet() ||
00151              NETSTACK_RADIO.channel_clear() == 0) {
00152             int len;
00153             uint8_t ackbuf[ACK_LEN];
00154 
00155             wt = RTIMER_NOW();
00156             watchdog_periodic();
00157             while(RTIMER_CLOCK_LT(RTIMER_NOW(),
00158                                   wt + AFTER_ACK_DETECTED_WAIT_TIME));
00159 
00160             if(NETSTACK_RADIO.pending_packet()) {
00161               len = NETSTACK_RADIO.read(ackbuf, ACK_LEN);
00162               if(len == ACK_LEN && ackbuf[2] == dsn) {
00163                 /* Ack received */
00164                 ret = MAC_TX_OK;
00165               } else {
00166                 /* Not an ack or ack not for us: collision */
00167                 ret = MAC_TX_COLLISION;
00168               }
00169             }
00170           }
00171         }
00172         break;
00173       case RADIO_TX_COLLISION:
00174         ret = MAC_TX_COLLISION;
00175         break;
00176       default:
00177         ret = MAC_TX_ERR;
00178         break;
00179       }
00180     }
00181 
00182 #else /* ! NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK */
00183 
00184     switch(NETSTACK_RADIO.send(packetbuf_hdrptr(), packetbuf_totlen())) {
00185     case RADIO_TX_OK:
00186       ret = MAC_TX_OK;
00187       break;
00188     case RADIO_TX_COLLISION:
00189       ret = MAC_TX_COLLISION;
00190       break;
00191     case RADIO_TX_NOACK:
00192       ret = MAC_TX_NOACK;
00193       break;
00194     default:
00195       ret = MAC_TX_ERR;
00196       break;
00197     }
00198 
00199 #endif /* ! NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK */
00200   }
00201   mac_call_sent_callback(sent, ptr, ret, 1);
00202 }
00203 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00204 static void
00205 packet_input(void)
00206 {
00207 #if NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK
00208   if(packetbuf_datalen() == ACK_LEN) {
00209     /* Ignore ack packets */
00210     /* PRINTF("nullrdc: ignored ack\n"); */
00211   } else
00212 #endif /* NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK */
00213   if(NETSTACK_FRAMER.parse() == 0) {
00214     PRINTF("nullrdc: failed to parse %u\n", packetbuf_datalen());
00215 #if NULLRDC_ADDRESS_FILTER
00216   } else if(!rimeaddr_cmp(packetbuf_addr(PACKETBUF_ADDR_RECEIVER),
00217                                          &rimeaddr_node_addr) &&
00218             !rimeaddr_cmp(packetbuf_addr(PACKETBUF_ADDR_RECEIVER),
00219                           &rimeaddr_null)) {
00220     PRINTF("nullrdc: not for us\n");
00221 #endif /* NULLRDC_ADDRESS_FILTER */
00222   } else {
00223 #if NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK || NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK_HW
00224     /* Check for duplicate packet by comparing the sequence number
00225        of the incoming packet with the last few ones we saw. */
00226     int i;
00227     for(i = 0; i < MAX_SEQNOS; ++i) {
00228       if(packetbuf_attr(PACKETBUF_ATTR_PACKET_ID) == received_seqnos[i].seqno &&
00229          rimeaddr_cmp(packetbuf_addr(PACKETBUF_ADDR_SENDER),
00230                       &received_seqnos[i].sender)) {
00231         /* Drop the packet. */
00232         PRINTF("nullrdc: drop duplicate link layer packet %u\n",
00233                packetbuf_attr(PACKETBUF_ATTR_PACKET_ID));
00234         return;
00235       }
00236     }
00237     for(i = MAX_SEQNOS - 1; i > 0; --i) {
00238       memcpy(&received_seqnos[i], &received_seqnos[i - 1],
00239              sizeof(struct seqno));
00240     }
00241     received_seqnos[0].seqno = packetbuf_attr(PACKETBUF_ATTR_PACKET_ID);
00242     rimeaddr_copy(&received_seqnos[0].sender,
00243                   packetbuf_addr(PACKETBUF_ADDR_SENDER));
00244 #endif /* NULLRDC_802154_AUTOACK */
00245     NETSTACK_MAC.input();
00246   }
00247 }
00248 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00249 static int
00250 on(void)
00251 {
00252   return NETSTACK_RADIO.on();
00253 }
00254 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00255 static int
00256 off(int keep_radio_on)
00257 {
00258   if(keep_radio_on) {
00259     return NETSTACK_RADIO.on();
00260   } else {
00261     return NETSTACK_RADIO.off();
00262   }
00263 }
00264 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00265 static unsigned short
00266 channel_check_interval(void)
00267 {
00268   return 0;
00269 }
00270 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00271 static void
00272 init(void)
00273 {
00274   on();
00275 }
00276 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00277 const struct rdc_driver nullrdc_driver = {
00278   "nullrdc",
00279   init,
00280   send_packet,
00281   packet_input,
00282   on,
00283   off,
00284   channel_check_interval,
00285 };
